events.message: The customer filed a claim reporting a car accident that occurred on April 28th involving a collision with another vehicle at an intersection.
Based on the report, the claim was categorized as an Auto Accident due to the involvement of the customer's car and the collision details provided.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to the case to ensure thorough handling of the customer's auto accident claim and provide necessary support.
The customer received official acknowledgement that their auto accident claim was received and is now being processed by the insurance company.
The claims agent requested additional documents including photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and repair estimates to proceed with the investigation.
The customer submitted all requested documents promptly, including vehicle photos, official police report, and a mechanic's damage assessment.
The investigation into the circumstances of the auto accident began, focusing on verifying the claim details and confirming liability based on submitted evidence.
The investigation was completed successfully with all evidence reviewed indicating that the customer's vehicle was damaged due to another driver's fault in the collision.
A settlement offer was proposed to the customer based on the repair estimates and policy coverage for the damages caused by the auto accident.
The customer responded positively to the settlement proposal and expressed satisfaction with the proposed compensation and service provided so far.
The auto accident claim was approved after final review and confirmation of coverage matching the customer's policy terms and submitted documentation.
The settlement payment was issued promptly to the customer's account, covering the repair costs for the vehicle damaged in the collision.
Following confirmation of receipt of payment and completion of repairs, the auto accident claim has been closed successfully to the customer's satisfaction.
All documents and records related to the auto accident claim have been securely archived for future reference as per company policy.
